intro: Psychotria viridialba, commonly known as the green psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves and small, white or pale yellow flowers. It produces small, dark blue to black berries that are often consumed by various bird species. Psychotria viridialba is also noted for its potential medicinal properties, though further research is needed to confirm its therapeutic uses.
